  • Uses of Operation in peersim.kademlia

    Methods in peersim.kademlia that return Operation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Operation
    KademliaProtocol.handleInit(Message m, int myPid)
    This method starts a find node operation, which searches for the ALPHA closest nodes to the provided node ID and sends a find request to them.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    KademliaEvents.nodesFound(Operation op, BigInteger[] neighbours)
    Callback method triggered when the operation finds neighboring nodes.
    void
    KademliaEvents.operationComplete(Operation op)
    Callback method triggered when the operation is complete.
    static void
    KademliaObserver.reportOperation(Operation op)
    Reports an operation, adding it to the find operation log.

  • Uses of Operation in peersim.kademlia.operations

    Subclasses of Operation in peersim.kademlia.operations
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FindOperation
    This class represents a find operation and offer the methods needed to maintain and update the closest set.
    It also maintains the number of parallel requsts that can has a maximum of ALPHA.
    class 
    GetOperation
    An extension of the FindOperation calss to represent the GetOperation.
    class 
    PutOperation
    This class represents a find operation and offer the methods needed to maintain and update the closest set.
